title: Update footer tagline and add cartoon images for each service category

requirements.text: Update the site footer so it displays exactly: "© 2026 - Crafted with care" and remove the current "Built with love using caffeine.ai" wording (including the heart icon, the literal word "using", and the caffeine.ai link).

quotes: in the footer "@ 2026. built with love using caffeine.ai" replace the line with "@ 2026 - Crafted with care"

acceptanceCriteria: Footer renders a single text line: "© 2026 - Crafted with care" (with the © symbol)
The footer no longer renders the Heart icon
The footer no longer renders the word "using" and no longer renders a link to https://caffeine.ai
Change is applied consistently across all supported languages (no language shows the old phrase/link)

requirements.text: Generate and add cartoon-style occupation images for each existing service category and store them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, one image per category: plumber, electrician, mason, house-cleaner, garden-cleaner, carpenter, painter, mechanic, and other.

quotes: Add the required images to service categories, like, add a plumber image to the plumber section, electrician image to electrician section and so on.
yes some cartoon images according to that occupation

acceptanceCriteria: All required category images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames
Each image is a clear cartoon illustration that visually matches the intended occupation
No category is left without an image (including "other")

requirements.text: Update the service category UI (category cards/grid) to display the new per-category cartoon images (matching the category ID) so users can visually identify each service category by its occupation image.

quotes: Add the required images to service categories, like, add a plumber image to the plumber section, electrician image to electrician section and so on.

acceptanceCriteria: Each category card shows the correct cartoon image for its category (e.g., plumber card shows plumber image)
Images are loaded directly from /assets/generated/* (static assets) and are not fetched via the backend
Layout remains responsive and visually balanced on mobile and desktop

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not modify frontend immutable hook/bootstrapping paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No changes to category IDs/names or admin category management behavior beyond displaying images.
